text: piche reh jane wale log rasol Allah(sallallahualaihiwasallam) ke jane ke badh apne baite rehne par khush hai,unhone Allah ki rah mein apne mal aur apne jano se jihad karna na pasand rakha aur unhone keh diya ke is garmi mein math niklo,keh dijiye ke dozakh ki aag bahuth hee saqth garm hai,kash ke wo samajhte hote
